V.iii.4.A.2.b
.
Evaluating Sleep Apnea
Evaluate sleep apnea using the criteria in
38 CFR 4.97, DC 6847
(sleep apnea syndromes (obstructive, central, mixed).
When determining whether the 50-percent criteria are met, the key consideration is whether use of a qualifying breathing assistance device is required by the severity of the sleep apnea.
There are two related considerations, which are
whether a device qualifies, as discussed in
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 4.A.2.c
, and
if use of a qualifying device is necessary, as discussed in
M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, 4.A.2.d
.
